CustomField.description: The payment reference for this installment.
CustomField.formula: IF ( NOT ( ISBLANK ( cpm__Custom_Payment_Reference__c ) ) , cpm__Custom_Payment_Reference__c , IF ( NOT ( ISBLANK ( cpm__Recurring_Payment_Reference__c ) ) , cpm__Recurring_Payment_Reference__c , cpm__Generated_Payment_Reference__c ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The payment reference for this installment.
CustomField.label: Final Payment Reference
